viewtier.ui
Class ValueChangedEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--viewtier.ui.ValueChangedEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
public class ValueChangedEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

ValueChangedEvent event is sent to a component when it's value was changed as a result of client's input. ValueChangedEvent is sent to Field, Text, CheckBox and RadioButton components.

See Also:
AbstractInput.addListener(ValueChangedListener), AbstractInput.addListener(ValueChangedListener), AbstractInput.addListener(ValueChangedListener), AbstractInput.addListener(ValueChangedListener), Serialized Form

clone

public java.lang.Object clone()
Creates a copy of this event.
Overrides:
clone in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a copy of this event.

getNewSelected

public int[] getNewSelected()
Returns indexes of selected items resulted from user input. This method makes sence for ListBox and DropDown componets. For other components it will return an integer array of zero lenght.

getNewValue

public java.lang.String getNewValue()
Returns new value of an input component

getOldSelected

public int[] getOldSelected()
Returns indexes of selected items before user input. This method makes sence for ListBox and DropDown componets. For other components it will return an integer array of zero lenght.

getOldValue

public java.lang.String getOldValue()
Returns old value of an input component. Old value is a value the component had before client changed it.
